name: Kirby Fun World
description:
Jump over and run through the levels with the arrows and jump with space bar.  Avoid the pits of death and air blocks. at the end of every level, there are trophy blocks, hit these and the next level is unlocked.  Try to collect coins to boost your score and collect the lives to ensure completion of the game. Watch for tricks with blocks and use the moving blocks to reach your goal faster.  

Kirby is on a mission to save his fun world from going bankrupt. Help him collect the coins and save his world.
